attributes.action: EU Referedum - Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty should be triggered immediately.
attributes.additional_details:
The European Commission have stated, there can be no negiotitans without invoking Article 50. Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty should be invoked immediately.
Any delay goes against the spirit & purpose of the referendum. It is essential that both Article 50 gets invoked immediately and formal negotiations begin.
When the Conservative party have chosen their final 2 choices of leader, they can lead the negotiations for the UK's exit from the EU.
No change of leadership should delay this process.
attributes.background: The result of a democratic process has concluded and the result has given the government a clear mandate. The majority have chosen to leave the EU.
